lead_paragraph: The San Jose Sharks have been the NHL's ultimate road warrior this season and will need to pack their A-game when they travel to Pittsburgh to the face the Penguins on Thursday in what could be the Stanley Cup decider.

headline.print_headline: Sharks Try to Put Penguins' Stanley Cup Party Plans on Ice
headline.main: Sharks Try to Put Penguins' Stanley Cup Party Plans on Ice

snippet: The San Jose Sharks have been the NHL's ultimate road warrior this season and will need to pack their A-game when they travel to Pittsburgh to the face the Penguins on Thursday in what could be the Stanley Cup decider....
